title: St. Anthony Village Clinic & Pharmacy
description: The St. Anthony Medical Center family medicine providers offer care for the whole family, including an onsite pharmacy.
cleaned_text: St. Anthony Village Clinic & Pharmacy The St. Anthony Village Clinic offers expert primary care services for every member of your family. With a convenient drive-thru pharmacy, we are located by the corner of Kenzie Terrace and St. Anthony Boulevard. A recent expansion includes more space, new specialties and new providers.
